Tagline: Southern Hemisphere satellite ground station facilities serving LEO and MEO customers around the world.
Overview:
SpaceOps NZ provides:
- Antenna hosting
- Antenna leasing
- LEOP services
from Awarua Satellite Ground Station at 186.38°E 46.53°S and Warkworth Space Centre at 36.43°S 174.66°E.

We also undertake:
- RF consultancy
- Radio licencing for ground segment
-Ground Segment R&D
Associated Members: 8 associated membersLinkedIn members who’ve listed Space Operations New Zealand Ltd as their current workplace on their profile.
Specialties: Satellite Ground Segment, LEOP Services, Radio Frequency Licencing, Antenna erection and maintenance, S/X Band Tx/Rx Antenna Leasing, UHF Antenna Leasing, and Antenna Hosting
